Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi Avar:
2 nee Pennai Vivaagampannavendaam; Ivvidaththil Unakkuk Kumaararum Kumaaraththigalum Irukkavendaam Endraar.
3 ivvidaththile Pirakkira Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum, Indhadhesaththil Avargalaip Petra Thaaigalaiyum Avargalaip Petra Pidhaakkalaiyunkuriththukkarththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal,

4 magaa Kodiya Vyaadhigalaal Saavaargal, Avargalukkaagap Pulambuvaarum, Avargalai Adakkampannuvaarumillai, Nilaththinmel Eruvaavaargal; Pattayaththaalum Panjaththaalum Madindhupovaargal; Avargaludaiya Predham Aagaasaththupparavaigalukkum Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Iraiyaagum.

5 aagaiyaal, Nee Dhukkaveettil Pravesiyaamalum, Pulambappogaamalum, Avargalukkup Paridhabikkaamalum Iruppaayaaga Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; En Samaadhaanaththaiyum, Kirubaiyaiyum, Irakkaththaiyum, Indha Janaththaivittu Eduththuppotten Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
6 indha Dhesaththile Periyorum Siriyorum Saavaargal; Avargalai Adakkampannuvaarillai; Avargalukkaagap Pulambuvaarumillai; Avargal Nimiththam Keerikkondu, Mottaiyadiththukkolvaarumillai.

7 seththavargal Nimiththam Undaana Dhukkaththai Aatra Avargalukku Appam Pangidappaduvadhumillai; Oruvanudaiya Thagappanukkaavadhu, Oruvanudaiya Thaaikkaavadhu Dhukkappadugiravargalukkuth Thetraravin Paaththiraththaik Kudikkakkoduppaarumillai.
8 nee Avargalode Pusiththukkudikka Utkaarumpadi Virundhuveettilum Pravesiyaayaaga.

9 enenil, Idho, Ivvidaththile Naan Ungal Kangalukku Munbaagavum, Ungal Naatkalilume, Sandhoshaththin Saththaththaiyum Magizhchchiyin Saththaththaiyum, Manavaalanin Saththaththaiyum, Manavaattiyin Saththaththaiyum Oyappannuven Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 nee Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Indha Janaththukku Arivikkumpodhu, Avargal Unnai Nokki: Karththar Engalmel Iththanai Periya Theengaik Kooruvaanen Endrum, Naangal Seydha Akkiramam Enna? Naangal Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaagachcheydha Engal Paavam Enna? Endrum Ketpaargalaanaal,
11 nee Avargalai Nokki: Ungal Pidhaakkal Ennaivittu Anniyadhevargalaip Pinpatri, Avargalai Seviththu, Avargalaip Panindhukondu, En Nyaayappramaanaththaik Kaikkollaamal Ennai Vittuvittaargale.
12 neengal Ungal Pidhaakkalaippaarkkilum Adhiga Kedaaga Nadandheergale, Idho Ungalil Ovvoruvarum En Sollaik Kelaadhapadikku Ungal Pollaadha Irudhaya Kadinaththinpadi Nadakkireergal.

13 aadhalaal, Ungalai Indhadhesaththilirundhu Neengalum Ungal Pidhaakkalum Ariyaadha Dhesaththirkuth Thuraththividuven; Ange Iravum Pagalum Anniyadhevargalai Sevippeergal; Ange Naan Ungalukku Dhayai Seyvadhillai.
14 aadhalaal, Idho, Naatkalvarum, Appozhudhu Isravel Puththirarai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Varappannina Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Inimel Saththiyampannaamal,

15 isravel Puththirarai Vadadhesaththilum Thaam Avargalaith Thuraththivitta Ellaa Dhesangalilumirundhu Varappannina Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Saththiyampannuvaargal; Naan Avargal Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduththa Avargaludaiya Dhesaththukku Avargalaith Thirumbivarappannuven Endru Karththarsollugiraar.

16 idho, Naan Meenpidikkira Anegarai Azhaiththanuppuven Ivargal Avargalaip Pidippaargal; Adharkup Pinbu Vettaikkaararaagiya Anegarai Azhaiththanuppuven, Ivargal Avargalai Ellaa Malaigalilum, Ellaakkundrugalilum, Kanmalaigalin Vedippugalilum Vettaiyaaduvaargal.

17 en Kangal Avargaludaiya Ellaa Vazhigalinmelum Nokkamaayirukkiradhu; Avaigal En Mugaththukku Munbaaga Maraindhirukkiradhillai, Avargaludaiya Akkiramam En Kangalukku Munbaaga Maraivaayirukkiradhumillai.

18 mudhalaavadhu Naan Avargaludaiya Akkiramaththukkum, Avargaludaiya Paavaththukkum Rattippaai Needhiyai Sarikkattuven; Avargal En Dhesaththaith Theettuppaduththi, En Sudhandharaththai Seeyendru Aruvarukkappadaththakka Thangal Kaariyangalin Naatramaana Vikkiragangalinaale Nirappinaargal Endru Karththarsollugiraar.

19 en Belanum, En Kottaiyum, Nerukkappadugira Naalil En Adaikkalamumaagiya Karththaave, Purajaadhigal Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalilirundhu Ummidaththil Vandhu: Meyyaagave, Engal Pidhaakkal Prayojanamillaadha Poiyaiyum Maayaiyaiyum Kaippatrinaargal Enbaargal.
20 manushan Thanakku Dhevargalai Undupannalaamo? Avaigal Dhevargal Allave.
21 aadhalaal, Idho, Ippozhudhu Naan Avargalukkuth Theriyappannuven; En Karaththaiyum En Belaththaiyume Avargalukkuth Theriyappannuven; En Naamam Yegovaa Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
